tern
  • Reference

Kaplan-Meier Plot

Create a KM plot for any survfit object.

g_km(fit_km, col = NULL, xticks = NULL, title = "Kaplan - Meier Plot",
  draw = TRUE, newpage = TRUE)

Arguments

fit_km

a class survfit object
col

a vector of color for each line
xticks

break interval of x-axis. It takes a numeric vector or NULL.
title

plot title
draw

boolean, should plot be drawn
newpage

boolean if draw=TRUE should plot be drawn on a new page

Examples

library(random.cdisc.data)

ASL <- radam("ASL")
ASL$RACE <- factor(sapply(as.character(ASL$RACE), function(x) {
   if (nchar(x)>9) paste0(substr(x, 1,9), "...") else x
}))
ATE <- radam("ATE", ADSL = ASL)

ATE_f <- subset(ATE, PARAMCD == "OS")

ANL <- merge(ASL, ATE_f, by = c("USUBJID", "STUDYID"))
fit_km <- survfit(Surv(AVAL, 1-CNSR) ~ ARM, data = ANL, conf.type = "plain")

g_km(fit_km = fit_km)

g_km(fit_km = fit_km, col = c("black", "red"))
